ntlm_type1 Struct Reference

#include <heimntlm.h>


Data Fields

uint32_t flags
char * domain
char * hostname
uint32_t os [2]

Detailed Description

Struct for the NTLM type1 message info, the strings is assumed to be in UTF8. When filled in by the library it should be freed with heim_ntlm_free_type1().
Examples:

test_ntlm.c.
